channel.title: RSPS.net
channel.description:
Visit the rune-server thread for more instant updates, will work on this thread and fix some stuff in it. http://www.rune-server.org/programming/website-development/projects/534060-rsps-net-server-status-development-thread.html
[CENTER][IMG]http://rsps.net/data/uploads/2014/02/rspslogo-5.png[/img] [URL=http://"www.rsps.net"]Home[/URL] - [URL=http://"www.rsps.net/status/"]Status Page[/URL] - Databases - Status Checker [/CENTER]
RSPS.NET was purchased only the other day, I have been watching this domain roughly since 2008 but I had just missed the purchase when it dropped back then. I plan to build my current RSTOPLIST project into something a little more spectacular. Seeing as there is quite a lot of competition out there these days I intend to bring something a little more special.
This thread will follow my development of the community website, I hope that you all like the domain and hopefully some may even follow / join the project! :)
[spoiler=Features] [COLOR="#FF0000"]----Homepage [COLOR="#00FF00"]----Server Status Page -- Register Server -- Edit Server[/COLOR] -- Subscribe Server Automatic -- Review Server + Star Rating [COLOR="#00FF00"]-- Hit Counts In / Out -- All Revisions Supported -- Gold Servers[/COLOR] -- AJAX Voting [COLOR="#00FF00"]-- Callback Voting -- Online Servers -- Offline Servers -- Random Server -- Most Popular Server[/COLOR] ----RSPS Tools -- AJAX Status Checker -- Item Database -- NPC Database[/COLOR] [COLOR="#00FF00"]----Community Forums[/COLOR] [/spoiler]
[spoiler=Updates] Coming Soon.. [/spoiler]
[spoiler=Media] [img]http://i57.tinypic.com/2ebycr9.jpg[/img] [img]http://i62.tinypic.com/fv9yeu.png[/img] [/spoiler]
[spoiler=Developers] [url=https://www.rsps.net/community/members/1-Diesel]Diesel[/url] [url=https://www.rsps.net/community/member.php?2-Kloux]Kloux[/url] [/spoiler]
If you got any suggestions on what this project could add then please let me know :)
If there's any graphics artists that may be interested in contributing to the project then don't hesitate to contact me.

item.title: RSPS.net
item.dc:creator: @kapronas kapronas
item.description:
@kapronas wrote:

Visit the rune-server thread for more instant updates, will work on this thread and fix some stuff in it.
http://www.rune-server.org/programming/website-development/projects/534060-rsps-net-server-status-development-thread.html

[CENTER]
[URL=http://“www.rsps.net”]Home[/URL] - [URL=http://“www.rsps.net/status/”]Status Page[/URL] - Databases - Status Checker
[/CENTER]

RSPS.NET was purchased only the other day, I have been watching this domain roughly since 2008 but I had just missed the purchase when it dropped back then. I plan to build my current RSTOPLIST project into something a little more spectacular. Seeing as there is quite a lot of competition out there these days I intend to bring something a little more special.

This thread will follow my development of the community website, I hope that you all like the domain and hopefully some may even follow / join the project!

[spoiler=Features]
[COLOR="#FF0000"]----Homepage
[COLOR="#00FF00"]----Server Status Page
– Register Server
– Edit Server[/COLOR]
– Subscribe Server Automatic
– Review Server + Star Rating
[COLOR="#00FF00"]-- Hit Counts In / Out
– All Revisions Supported
– Gold Servers[/COLOR]
– AJAX Voting
[COLOR="#00FF00"]-- Callback Voting
– Online Servers
– Offline Servers
– Random Server
– Most Popular Server[/COLOR]
----RSPS Tools
– AJAX Status Checker
– Item Database
– NPC Database[/COLOR]
[COLOR="#00FF00"]----Community Forums[/COLOR]
[/spoiler]

[spoiler=Updates]
Coming Soon…
[/spoiler]

[spoiler=Media]


[/spoiler]

[spoiler=Developers]
Diesel
Kloux
[/spoiler]

If you got any suggestions on what this project could add then please let me know

If there’s any graphics artists that may be interested in contributing to the project then don’t hesitate to contact me.
